author: Yanaida Prado
description: Recipe supplied by Patrón, who say, “Citrus and spice shines bright in the Mediterranean Margarita, made for the sights and sounds of Spain. From Yanaida Prado, this modern cocktail takes the smooth oak and light citrus notes of Patrón Reposado over-the-top with punchy orange marmalade, classic lime juice and agave, and deep sherry.”
name: Mediterranean Margarita

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and fine strain into chilled Chamoy/Tajín-rimmed glass
